title: InformedPriors by Horizontal Gene Transfer (HGT)
description: InformedPriors by Horizontal Gene Transfer (HGT) is an AI-powered disease pathway research tool that uses NLP to extract the causal relationships in medical literature to construct an extensive knowledge graph.
description_lemmatized: informedpriors horizontal gene transfer hgt aipowered disease pathway research tool us nlp extract causal relationship medical literature construct extensive knowledge graph
